remarks: Distribute function operation through a sequence.  Maps-to notation version of ~ seqof .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jul-2017.)
statement:
seqof2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
seqof2.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqof2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( M ... N ) C_ B ) $.
seqof2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ z e. A ) ) -> X e. W ) $.
seqof2 $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( oF .+ , ( x e. B |-> ( z e. A |-> X ) ) ) ` N ) = ( z e. A |-> ( seq M ( .+ , ( x e. B |-> X ) ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d .+ z $.
$d A x z $.
$d B x $.
$d M x z $.
$d N x z $.
$d ph x z $.
